description:
Mom is in an unusually good mood, and is dressing herself up. It seems she`s preparing to go meet with her "first love"! Dad says it doesn`t bother him at all, but he can`t help feeling restless... So he and B.B.B. secretly follow Mom to the meeting place. The man who arrives on the scene is a real dandy who seems like he could steal Mom away any time! Dad can`t just stand around... What will he do?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Look Who Showed Up?! Mom`s Boyfriend
現れた!? ハハの恋人
